attributes.action: Call for the immediate resignation of the Archbishop of Canterbury - Dr. Rowan Williams.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The views of the Archbishop of Canterbury, Dr. Rowan Williams, in supporting and advocating the use of Sharia Law for Muslims in our country, is incompatable with his position as Head of a Christian Church. Dr. Williams's views undermine the principle of UK Law for ALL of its citizens. As Head of the Church of England,a Christian Church, Dr. Williams's views are unacceptable. Dr. Williams's position is therefore untenable and his views betray the fundamental principles of UK Law.We, the undersigned, call on Mr. Gordon Brown  - Prime Minister of the UK - to make a statement in Parliament demanding the resignation of Dr. Williams as Head of the Church of England with immediate effect.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
